ygData.subject: Re: Weapon question
ygData.msgSnippet: http://www.geocities.com/copelandeq/weaponanalyzer.html Go to this web site and
ygData.messageBody:
<a href=http://www.geocities.com/copelandeq/weaponanalyzer.html target=new>http://www.geocities.com/copelandeq/weaponanalyzer.html</a> Go to this web site and download the analyzer it
will help you figure out which weapon is what you
want. Using this you will see that the vls actually
causes more damage (4dmg more) than the axe. Not much
but in a long battle can add up. And as far as
casting during a battle (solo) in the time you take to
cast a spell you can do the same or more damage with
your weapon. Just my 2cps but I found that casting
before and after, buffs and heals and snare and kicking
ass in the heat of battle works very well. again just
my 2cps worth.<br><br>Keban Arrowsmith <Royal
Fletchers><br>Ranger of the 21st season<br>Master Fletcher<br>Pretty
Good Brewer
